snippet.title: 86 Anime is TRASH...
snippet.description:
Anime fans watch 86 Eighty-Six anime for the first time. Animation from A-1 Pictures, oundtracks from Hiroyuki Sawano known for AOT, Blue Exorcist, Seven deadly Sins and Saori Hayami as a japanese voice actor or seiyuu. Story of a Shin and Lena. It's on crunchyroll #anime #manga #romanceanime #86eightysix 

Socials:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kitokunx
Discord: https://discord.gg/6Wb6Wj2S57
Twitter: https://twitter.com/kitokitox
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@kitotok2
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/kitosenpai420
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/KitoSenpai

Here's a romance anime to watch
Anime / Manga:  86 Eighty-Six - 86―エイティシックス―  TVアニメ
Similar anime: Attack on Titan, Code Geass, Aldnoah.Zero, Darling in the Franxx, Violet Evergarden, Vivy Flourite Eye's Song, Akame ga Kill
BGM: tiny light by akari kitou from tbhk (toilet bound hanako-kun) + 86 -EIGHTY SIX- Episode 22 OST: Voice of the Chord (Instrumental Cover)【86-エイティシックス】+ LilaS SawanoHiroyuki[nZk]:Honoka Takahashi

Summer 2023 anime: Oshi no Ko, Jujutsu Kaisen, Mushoku Tensei, zom 100, Horimiya, Rent a Girlfriend, Dark Gathering as covered by gigguk

snippet.title: 86 EIGHTY-SIX - Opening 2 | Kyoukaisen
snippet.description:
👉 Anime : 86 EIGHTY-SIX
🎵 Musique : « Kyoukaisen » par amazarashi
📺 Où regarder : https://got.cr/3Cltn6X 

Pour répondre aux attaques de drones autonomes envoyés par l’empire voisin de Giad, la république de San Magnolia a développé ses propres drones de combat surnommés les “Juggernaut"", espérant ainsi limiter les pertes humaines. En réalité, ces appareils sont pilotés par les 86, les habitants d’un district secret considérés comme du bétail

Retrouve sur Crunchyroll les derniers anime légalement en HD sur ta TV, PC ou console juste après la diffusion japonaise ! 🌟

snippet.title: 86: EIGHTY SIX, O ANIME QUE VAI TE REVOLTAR! UMA DAS HISTÓRIAS MAIS CRUÉIS QUE JÁ ASSISTI! [Review]
snippet.description:
86: EIGHTY SIX é um anime pouco comentado mas que tem uma das histórias mais cruéis e revoltantes que eu já assisti. A república de San Magnólia está em guerra a anos e, para enfrentar a batalha, eles enviam drones operados por pessoas que fazem parte de uma parcela da população que foi confinada a segregação por não serem puros etnicamente.

Qualquer semelhança com a realidade não é mera coincidência. A obra vai tratar temas como racismo, segregação racial e social, apartheid, discriminação, traumas de guerra, desumanização, perda de identidade e vai fazer você refletir sobre os seus próprios atos.

Os protagonistas, a Vladilena e o The Undertaker (Shin) são muito bem construídos e o grupo todo que vive no distrito 86 possuem uma dinâmica muito bem trabalhada.

No final das contas, 86: EIGHTY SIX é aquele anime que dá um tapa na nossa cara e que nos transforma depois de assistirmos e hoje eu trago ele como indicação num review curtinho, mas completo, pra vocês entenderem porque vale a pena assistir!

SE QUISER APOIAR O CANAL VOCÊ PODE:

1-MANDAR UMA LISTA, ARTIGO OU TEORIA PARA:
nandatavassi@gmail.com 

2-MANDAR UM PIX PARA:
nandatavassi@gmail.com     

3-SEGUIR NAS REDES SOCIAIS:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fernandatavassi

​​TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@fernandatavassi​

4-COMPARTILHAR ESSE VÍDEO COM SEUS AMIGOS!

Contato profissional:
nandatavassi@gmail.com

snippet.description:

snippet.title: 1 Minuto para te Fazer Assistir esse Anime... 🤯🔫 (86 Eighty Six - Anime de Guerra Futurista)
snippet.description:
1 Minuto para te Fazer Assistir esse Anime... 🤯🔫 (86 Eighty Six - Anime de Guerra Futurista)

Este vídeo de anime é sobre: Eu vou fazer você querer assistir esse anime em 1 minuto! Imagina viver em um mundo onde sua existência é negada... mesmo enquanto você luta pela sobrevivência. Enquanto seu país relata ao povo que eles venceram uma batalha com suas unidades de elite não tripuladas chamadas de 86 Eighty Six... dizendo que as baixas foram minúsculas e sem mortes humanas!

Anime: 86: Eighty Six

Eu vou fazer você querer assistir esse anime em 1 minuto! Imagina viver em um mundo onde sua existência é negada... mesmo enquanto você luta pela sobrevivência. Enquanto seu país relata ao povo que eles venceram uma batalha com suas unidades de elite não tripuladas chamadas de 86 Eighty Six... dizendo que as baixas foram minúsculas e sem mortes humanas! Vladilena Milizé agora irá assumir o posto de operadora da unidade de elite chamada Esquadrão Spearhead. Mas há boatos de que o comandante Undertaker conhecido como Ceifador, acabou com o antigo operador, além de fazer todos os operadores anteriores, aposentarem ou trocarem de unidade. Vladilena relatava as mortes em seus relatórios, mas seu superior pediu para que parasse, já que não havia humanos lá. Mas isso é uma grande mentira, na verdade, as máquinas são controladas por soldados excluidos do país, que lutam para derrotar outras máquinas. Infelizmente, o comandante Undertaker teve que finalizar um dos seus soldados da unidade, já que ele foi gravemente ferido. Então, durante a noite, Vladilena entrou em contato com a unidade para se apresentar... e agora eles irão trabalhar juntos para lutar contra a força inimiga. Mas diferente dos antigos operadores, Vladilena trata eles com respeito... a ponto de interromper uma aula para contar a verdade para uma sala de aula inteira!

snippet.title: This Anime ALMOST MADE ME CRY...😭
snippet.description:
86 Eighty-Six anime was a masterpiece. Animation from A-1 Pictures, epic orchestral soundtracks from Hiroyuki Sawano known for AOT, Blue Exorcist, Seven deadly Sins and Saori Hayami as a japanese voice actress or seiyuu. The story of a Shin and Lena. It's on crunchyroll and i just like meme-ing the fact that cdawgva connor hates it #anime #manga #romanceanime #86anime 

Socials:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kitokunx
Discord: https://discord.gg/6Wb6Wj2S57
Twitter: https://twitter.com/kitokitox
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@kitotok2
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/KitoSenpai

Here's a romance anime to watch
Anime / Manga:  86 Eighty-Six - 86―エイティシックス―  TVアニメ
Similar anime: Attack on Titan, Code Geass, Aldnoah.Zero, Darling in the Franxx, Violet Evergarden, Vivy Flourite Eye's Song, Akame ga Kill
BGM: tiny light by akari kitou from tbhk (toilet bound hanako-kun) + 86 -EIGHTY SIX- Episode 22 OST: Voice of the Chord (Instrumental Cover)【86-エイティシックス】+ LilaS SawanoHiroyuki[nZk]:Honoka Takahashi

Summer 2023 anime: Oshi no Ko, Jujutsu Kaisen, Mushoku Tensei, zom 100, Horimiya, Rent a Girlfriend, Dark Gathering as covered by gigguk

snippet.title: Avid - 86 / Eighty-Six (Episode 22 version) ED [Piano] / Hiroyuki Sawano
snippet.description:
Sheet music → https://mymusic.st/animenzzz/61268

This piano arrangement of 「Avid」 is directly inspired by episode 22 of the anime series. It has probably one of the most beautiful cinematography I have ever seen in a TV anime and the emotional rollercoaster was simply overwhelming. The final two episodes of Eighty Six was delayed for three months but in exchange we got a cinema-level of anime production – absolutely worth it.

The official name for the OST used in ep 22 is called 「Voices of the Chord」and it’s basically an orchestral version of the ED song 「Avid」. My piano arrangement is based on the full size of 「Avid」but I adopted a slow tempo based on the orchestra version and have modified the flow of the music a little bit to make it more cinematic, including a key change in 4:08. I also used many orchestration methods in this piano arrangements to fully capture the beauty of episode 22.

① New pedaling technique 
Fitting to the lyrics of 「Avid」("it calls, it calls"), I let the piano "resonate" its sound a bit more than usual by mostly using half pedal during the performance and releasing the sustain pedal very slowly for longer notes. This creates a very interesting "mixed harmonic", which slowly clears up by itself until only a very few notes remain. It can be heard in 1:47, 4:04, and 5:02.

② "Emptiness" in the music
Since the main character Shinei has earned the title of "grim reaper" during his long duty on the battlefield, I cannot possibly imagine the amount of loneliness he is feeling, especially if he is being left behind again. The second verse in 1:49 reflects the emptiness of Shinei's mind and the melody is split up into tiny fragments, never reaching its full melody. 

③ The "miracle" in the flower field
[ep. 22 spoilers]
In one of the final scenes of the anime, Shinei has accepted his fate and the music in 3:38 suddenly drops to a bare minimum, slowly diminishing until almost nothing is left in 4:01. Then, the key change in 4:08 happens: This is the moment where Major Milize steps into the battlefield and Shinei's destiny is changed forever. The landscape suddenly changes from a blue sea of Insects into a beautiful red flowerbed. 

The miracle must be dramatically celebrated at the climax. The left hand is hitting the lower bass notes for the first time to achieve an enormous orchestral sound while the right hand is playing a secondary melody (consisting of thirds and fourths) to represent the red spider lilies dancing in the wind. This is the moment I was waiting for in the anime. This is the moment why I live for Anime and Anime music. And this is why anime is simply the best art. 
[/ep. 22 spoilers]

Alright, thank you for reading this week’s "Animenz explains!" It has been a really, really long time since I was that moved by an anime episode and I hope I can experience more moments like this again in the future. A moment where "everything just feels right". 

Thank you for watching my piano arrangement and see you in the next video again!

Animenz

localized.title: Avid - 86 / Eighty-Six (Episode 22 version) ED [Piano] / Hiroyuki Sawano
localized.description:
Sheet music → https://mymusic.st/animenzzz/61268

This piano arrangement of 「Avid」 is directly inspired by episode 22 of the anime series. It has probably one of the most beautiful cinematography I have ever seen in a TV anime and the emotional rollercoaster was simply overwhelming. The final two episodes of Eighty Six was delayed for three months but in exchange we got a cinema-level of anime production – absolutely worth it.

The official name for the OST used in ep 22 is called 「Voices of the Chord」and it’s basically an orchestral version of the ED song 「Avid」. My piano arrangement is based on the full size of 「Avid」but I adopted a slow tempo based on the orchestra version and have modified the flow of the music a little bit to make it more cinematic, including a key change in 4:08. I also used many orchestration methods in this piano arrangements to fully capture the beauty of episode 22.

① New pedaling technique 
Fitting to the lyrics of 「Avid」("it calls, it calls"), I let the piano "resonate" its sound a bit more than usual by mostly using half pedal during the performance and releasing the sustain pedal very slowly for longer notes. This creates a very interesting "mixed harmonic", which slowly clears up by itself until only a very few notes remain. It can be heard in 1:47, 4:04, and 5:02.

② "Emptiness" in the music
Since the main character Shinei has earned the title of "grim reaper" during his long duty on the battlefield, I cannot possibly imagine the amount of loneliness he is feeling, especially if he is being left behind again. The second verse in 1:49 reflects the emptiness of Shinei's mind and the melody is split up into tiny fragments, never reaching its full melody. 

③ The "miracle" in the flower field
[ep. 22 spoilers]
In one of the final scenes of the anime, Shinei has accepted his fate and the music in 3:38 suddenly drops to a bare minimum, slowly diminishing until almost nothing is left in 4:01. Then, the key change in 4:08 happens: This is the moment where Major Milize steps into the battlefield and Shinei's destiny is changed forever. The landscape suddenly changes from a blue sea of Insects into a beautiful red flowerbed. 

The miracle must be dramatically celebrated at the climax. The left hand is hitting the lower bass notes for the first time to achieve an enormous orchestral sound while the right hand is playing a secondary melody (consisting of thirds and fourths) to represent the red spider lilies dancing in the wind. This is the moment I was waiting for in the anime. This is the moment why I live for Anime and Anime music. And this is why anime is simply the best art. 
[/ep. 22 spoilers]

Alright, thank you for reading this week’s "Animenz explains!" It has been a really, really long time since I was that moved by an anime episode and I hope I can experience more moments like this again in the future. A moment where "everything just feels right". 

Thank you for watching my piano arrangement and see you in the next video again!

Animenz

snippet.title: Vladilena Milize?! ✨ | 🌟 86 & Eighty Six 🌟 | Anime Edit 4K Quality! 🔥
snippet.description:
✨🌟🔥✨🌟🔥✨🌟🔥✨🌟🔥✨🌟🔥✨🌟🔥



                     ✨ ♡Vladilena Milize?! ✨
                         🌟 86 & Eighty Six 🌟
                  🔥 Anime Edit 4K Quality! 🔥



✨ ANIME Character: Vladilena Milize ✨



🌟 ANIME: Eighty Six 🌟



🔥 Other: Plot: 
The Republic of San Magnolia has been at war with the Empire of Giad for nine years. Though it initially suffered devastating losses to the Empire's autonomous mechanized Legions, the Republic has since developed its own autonomous units, called Juggernauts, which are directed remotely by a Handler. While on the surface, the public believes the war is being fought between machines, in reality, the Juggernauts are being piloted by humans, all of whom are "86"—the designation given to the Colorata minority of San Magnolia. The 86 originally had equal rights, but were persecuted and scapegoated by the dominant Alba race and the Alba-supremacist Republic government to the point where Colorata were both officially designated and popularly considered subhuman. The 86 were not permitted to have personal names and were immured in internment camps in the 86th District (their namesake), all the while being forced to fight in the Republic's war with the Empire to receive better treatment.

Major Vladilena "Lena" Milizé, an Alba noble and military officer in the San Magnolian military, is an outspoken activist against the grave mistreatment of the nation's Colorata minority, and the willful deception of the general public by the Republic government. She is assigned as the Handler of the Spearhead Squadron of the Eastern Front: an elite unit composed entirely of 86 veterans who have earned names. Led by their squad leader, Shinei "The Undertaker" Nouzen, the Spearhead Squadron is infamous among military officials. Its notoriety stems from the state in which its commanding officers are left: Handlers presiding over the squad have descended into insanity and some have gone as far as committing suicide. Lena, an avowed 86 sympathizer, gets to know the Spearhead Squadron in her time as head of the contingent. At the same time, Lena and Shinei learn a dark secret: the Republic and the war with the Empire are not what they seem. 🔥



✨🌟🔥✨🌟🔥✨🌟🔥✨🌟🔥✨🌟🔥✨🌟🔥
tags: ヴラディレーナ・ミリーゼ
